title: Atrix BP40 Furniture Nozzle Ergo Backpack Series Vacuums, 3-inch, Black
features: COMPATIBLE WITH ATRIX BACKPACK SERIES VACUUMS. The Atrix Backpack nozzle set is compatible with the backpack series including models: VACBP1, VACBP400, and VACBP36V
LEVER TO ENGAGE BRUSHES. You are able to adjust the brushes depending on the use case that allows you to transition from carpets to furniture with a breeze
COLLECT MORE PARTICLES. The plastic bristles get out deeply rooted particles and dust that allows for a deep clean
RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL APPLICATIONS. This handheld vacuum is an affordable option for your home, condo, or apartment to clean air vents, window sills, computers printers, and video equipment
3 INCH BRUSH. The 3 inch wide brush allows you to tackle large jobs in less time while still retaining powerful suction from the vacuum
description: The furniture nozzle, product SKU BP40 is compatible with the Ergo series vacuums.
